_description: The ‘Laud’ Troy Book — 18664 lines in couplets

BodLauMis595.First Lines:
Alle myghty god in triniteSothfaste god in persones
                    thre…
BodLauMis595.Last Lines:
…And graunte hit mot so beSayeth alle Amen for
                    charite
BodLauMis595.Attributed Title:
Hic Belli de Troye ffinit. Et Greci transierunt versus Patriam suam
                    (f. 275)

Wülfing,  Johann Ernst,
                        ed.
